answer:
ImmunizeBC does not have immunization records. If the immunizations were given at a health unit or in school, you will need to contact your local health unit to request the record.  
You can find tips for locating immunization records here. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## ImmunizeBC does not have immunization records.

If the immunizations were given at a health unit or in school, you will need to contact your local health unit to request the record.

## You can find tips for locating immunization records here.

Immunization Nurse
question: Do I have to go to the public health office to get a list of what immunizations were done and when? Or is this something I have access too on this website?
question_variation_0: do i need to go to public health office to get a list of what immunizations were done and when

question_variation_2: why do we need to go to public health office for immunization list?
